mean_cn: n. 成绩，成就，实现，完成
mean_en: something that has been done or achieved through effort :a result of hard work
word_etyma: achieve成功 + ment名词后缀 →  achievement 成就
short_phrase: Graduating from college is an achievement.
sentence: Walking on the moon was a remarkable achievement.
sentence_trans: 在月球上行走是一项了不起的成就。
